[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” admin_label=”Header Section” _builder_version=”3.0.89″ custom_padding=”|||”][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”Cosmetic Dentistry” content_max_width=”600px” _builder_version=”3.0.91″ title_font=”Nunito Sans|900||on|||||” title_font_size=”40px” title_text_color=”#253542″ title_letter_spacing=”7px” title_line_height=”1.4em” content_font=”Nunito Sans|700|||||||” content_font_size=”18px” content_text_color=”#253542″ content_line_height=”1.8em” background_image=”https://uptownsmiles.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/perfectsmile1.jpg” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”10%||10%|” custom_button_one=”on” button_one_text_size=”16px” button_one_text_color=”#ffffff” button_one_bg_color=”#253542″ button_one_border_width=”10px” button_one_border_color=”#253542″ button_one_letter_spacing=”2px” button_one_font=”Nunito Sans|800||on|||||” button_one_use_icon=”off” button_one_text_color_hover=”#ffffff” button_one_bg_color_hover=”#79abab” button_one_border_color_hover=”#79abab” button_one_letter_spacing_hover=”2px” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_zoom=”5%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%”]A smile can be the most eye-catching feature of your face. Even a subtle change can make a big difference in the way you look and feel. New techniques like whitening, bonding, enamel shaping, veneers, and white fillings allow us to create a beautiful smile with, at times, only minimal changes to existing teeth.
[/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ background_color=”#253542″ use_custom_width=”on” width_unit=”off” custom_width_percent=”100%” make_equal=”on” specialty=”on” background_color_2=”#ffffff” _builder_version=”3.0.91″ custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|5%”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text background_layout=”dark” _builder_version=”3.0.91″ text_font=”Nunito Sans||||||||” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”|900|||||||” header_font_size=”40px” header_text_color=”#253542″ header_letter_spacing=”7px” header_line_height=”1.4em” header_2_font=”Nunito Sans|900||on|||||” header_2_font_size=”34px” header_2_letter_spacing=”7px” header_2_line_height=”1.4em” max_width=”600px” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”|||” custom_margin_tablet=”60px|||” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_padding=”|||” locked=”off”]

Cosmetic Dentistry Services

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ specialty_columns=”3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ background_color=”#ffffff”][et_pb_row_inner custom_padding=”80px|5%||5%” background_color=”#548893″ _builder_version=”3.0.91″ border_width_all=”2px” border_color_all=”#61ac99″][et_pb_column_inner type=”1_3″ saved_specialty_column_type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ box_shadow_position=”outer” parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_blurb title=”Teeth Whitening” icon_color=”#79ABAB” image=”https://uptownsmiles.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/bleaching.gif” _builder_version=”3.0.91″ header_font=”Nunito Sans|800||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_letter_spacing=”2px” body_font=”Nunito Sans||||||||” body_text_align=”center” body_font_size=”16px” body_line_height=”1.8em” border_width_all=”2px” border_color_all=”#61ac99″ border_color_all_image=”#61ac99″ animation_style=”zoom” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” animation=”off”]Teeth Whitening is a very popular procedure in cosmetic dentistry. It is a relatively easy and effective technique for obtaining a dazzling, whiter smile, at home, in a matter of days.
[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column_inner][et_pb_column_inner type=”1_3″ saved_specialty_column_type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ box_shadow_position=”outer” parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_blurb title=”Same Day Crowns” icon_color=”#79ABAB” image=”https://uptownsmiles.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/e4d04.jpg” _builder_version=”3.0.91″ header_font=”Nunito Sans|800||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_letter_spacing=”2px” body_font=”Nunito Sans||||||||” body_text_align=”center” body_font_size=”16px” body_line_height=”1.8em” background_color=”#61ac99″ animation_style=”zoom” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” animation=”off”]E4D – Same Day Crowns, Veneers, and Onlays – Forget those weeks of waiting for your crowns and veneers to come in, having to wear temporaries, and making multiple trips to the dentist.
[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column_inner][et_pb_column_inner type=”1_3″ saved_specialty_column_type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ box_shadow_position=”outer” parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_blurb title=”Bonding” icon_color=”#79ABAB” image=”https://uptownsmiles.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/bonding.gif” _builder_version=”3.0.91″ header_font=”Nunito Sans|800||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_letter_spacing=”2px” body_font=”Nunito Sans||||||||” body_text_align=”center” body_font_size=”16px” body_line_height=”1.8em” border_width_all=”2px” border_color_all=”#61ac99″ animation_style=”zoom” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” animation=”off”]Bonding is a procedure where tooth-colored composite resin material is placed to “fill in the blanks.” One of the most frequent uses of the bonding technique is to fill in a gap between front teeth.
[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column_inner][/et_pb_row_inner][et_pb_row_inner custom_padding=”|5%|80px|5%” background_color=”#548893″ _builder_version=”3.0.91″][et_pb_column_inner type=”1_3″ saved_specialty_column_type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ box_shadow_position=”outer” parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_blurb title=”Enamel Shaping” icon_color=”#79ABAB” image=”https://uptownsmiles.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/shaping.gif” _builder_version=”3.0.91″ header_font=”Nunito Sans|800||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_letter_spacing=”2px” body_font=”Nunito Sans||||||||” body_text_align=”center” body_font_size=”16px” body_line_height=”1.8em” background_color=”#61ac99″ animation_style=”zoom” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” animation=”off”]Enamel Shaping (Contouring). Shaping can be used to correct minor cases of crowded or overlapping teeth, smooth rough edges, or make small adjustments to the shape of a tooth.
[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column_inner][et_pb_column_inner type=”1_3″ saved_specialty_column_type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ box_shadow_position=”outer” parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_blurb title=”Veneers” icon_color=”#79ABAB” image=”https://uptownsmiles.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/veneers.gif” _builder_version=”3.0.91″ header_font=”Nunito Sans|800||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_letter_spacing=”2px” body_font=”Nunito Sans||||||||” body_text_align=”center” body_font_size=”16px” body_line_height=”1.8em” border_width_all=”2px” border_color_all=”#61ac99″ border_color_all_image=”#61ac99″ animation_style=”zoom” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” animation=”off”]Veneers are laboratory fabricated, porcelain facings that are bonded to the front surfaces of teeth to whiten teeth, close spaces, straighten teeth, or repair chipped or worn teeth
[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column_inner][et_pb_column_inner type=”1_3″ saved_specialty_column_type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ box_shadow_position=”outer” parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_blurb title=”White Fillings” icon_color=”#79ABAB” image=”https://uptownsmiles.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/whiterest.gif” _builder_version=”3.0.91″ header_font=”Nunito Sans|800||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_letter_spacing=”2px” body_font=”Nunito Sans||||||||” body_text_align=”center” body_font_size=”16px” body_line_height=”1.8em” background_color=”#61ac99″ animation_style=”zoom” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” animation=”off”]White fillings replace silver or gold fillings with a more natural looking tooth-colored material instead of dark fillings which  cause the whole tooth to appear darker when viewed from the side
[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column_inner][/et_pb_row_inner][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ background_color=”#cfe0de” admin_label=”Hero Section” _builder_version=”3.0.91″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#548893″ background_color_gradient_end=”#f7f7f7″ background_color_gradient_direction=”90deg” background_color_gradient_start_position=”33%” background_color_gradient_end_position=”33%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” custom_padding=”110px|0px|110px|0px”][et_pb_row custom_padding=”|||” background_color_2=”#f7f7f7″ padding_2_tablet=”10%|10%|10%|10%” padding_2_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”Video Area” _builder_version=”3.0.91″ animation_direction=”left”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_video src=”https://youtu.be/nGOuaCY4dzI” image_src=”//i.ytimg.com/vi/nGOuaCY4dzI/hqdefault.jpg” play_icon_color=”#0083ff” _builder_version=”3.0.91″ custom_margin=”|||” box_shadow_style=”preset2″ box_shadow_horizontal=”10px” box_shadow_vertical=”20px” box_shadow_blur=”80px” box_shadow_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.22)”][/et_pb_video][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ padding_tablet=”10%|10%|10%|10%” padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” background_color=”#f7f7f7″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”3.0.91″ text_font_size=”16px” text_text_color=”#63748a” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_2_font=”Poppins||||||||” header_2_text_align=”left” header_2_font_size=”36px” header_2_text_color=”#1d6ad6″ max_width=”700px” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_fold=”20%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” locked=”off”]

If you have a family reunion or a wedding fast approaching, or if you simply want a bright, healthy smile, contact us today to setup a consult! At Riverbend Dental Center, we offer easy, affordable in office Whiter Image teeth whitening that takes about an hour, or we can create custom Whiter Image trays and you can whiten and brighten your smile in the privacy of your own home.

Whiter Image Teeth Whitening Options:

  • Home Edition Teeth Whitening Kit
  • Chic-Flic Teeth Whitening & Lip Gloss Plumper Pen
  • Whiter Image Teeth Whitening Pen
  • Whiter Image In-Office Treatment
